Name: City of Edges
About the game: 'You are special. You are unique. But what does it mean?' City of Edges is a walking simulator that tells the story of a misfit: you, made of 'roundness', in a city full of sharp and broken edges. In this 30-60 minute game, you will wander across this unfriendly place in search of answers and, eventually, others that are also unique in their own way. Take your time and explore this world. Live the metaphor, feel the sound, and be unique.
